articles.title: Decision of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Decision of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea made a decision to convene the Third Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the WPK on April 20 in order to discuss and decide the policy issues of new stage in line with the demand of the important historic period of the developing Korean revolution. 
					 A relevant decision of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee was announced on Wednesday.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Wednesday.
					 The message expressed gratitude to Kim Jong Un for sending warm congratulations on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the independence of Syria.
					
					 It highly appreciated Kim Jong Un's stand of support to the just cause of Syria and his sincere intention for Syria's sovereignty and stability.
					
					 The Syrian president, in the message, wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the friendly Korean people led by him greater happiness and wellbeing, expressing once again gratitude to him.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Foreign Guests
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, respectively met and had talk with the delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation led by First Secretary Valery Rashukin and Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, that paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy Thursday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present on invitation were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission and chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ho Yong Bok, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Ik Song, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Reception Given at Indonesian Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given at Indonesian Embassy
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday to mark the 53rd anniversary of the visit to Indonesia by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present on invitation were Choe Hui Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Ambassador Bambang Hiendrasto and staff members of the embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Japanese Friendship Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Friendship Delegation Here
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- An Okayama prefectural Japan-Korea friendship delegation of Japan led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Home-visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Home-visiting Group of Koreans in Japan Here
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan led by Hong Ryung Nam arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City of China led by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong left here on Thursday.

articles.title: DR Congo Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DR Congo Party Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Party of DR Congo led by General Secretary Boswa Isekombe Sylvere left here for home Thursday.

articles.title: Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Struggle Leave
articles.content:
Families of Those Related to Anti-Japanese Struggle Leave
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and families of Kim Sun Ok and So Sun Ok, China-resident Koreans related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, left here on Thursday.
					 Also, departing on the same day was Choe Mun Sik, chairman of the Society for Preservation of Revolutionary Sites in Yanbian of China.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups Leave
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups Leave
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates of Juche idea study groups left here for home on Thursday. 
					 They were delegations of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, and a Bulgarian delegate for the study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Departing earlier was a delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Moscow City Committee of Russian Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Moscow City Committee of Russian Party
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by First Secretary Valery Rashukin who is leading the delegation of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on a visit to the DPRK Thursday.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Int'l Festival Organizing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Int'l Festival Organizing Committee
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the inaugural ceremony of the organizing committee of the International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on April 11.
					 The letter said that the participants would make all efforts to more significantly and splendidly organize the international festival, with the honor and pride of having lauded President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il as the eternal great sun in the era of independence and HE Kim Jong Un as the sun of the 21st century guiding the cause of global independence to victory last August when they climbed Mt Paektu during the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu in Korea.
					
					 Today the world progressives are watching with deep emotion and admiration the reality of the DPRK in which the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are carried forward and developed in all fields by Kim Jong Un, the letter noted, adding:
					
					 The DPRK rose up proudly to the position of strategic state, recognized by the world, smashing the persistent provocations and threats of the hostile forces. This is a brilliant fruition of the line of self-defence, the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the noble mission for global peace consistently maintained by the illustrious great men.
					
					 In particular, HE Kim Jong Un's lightning activities making a great sensation worldwide are a clear demonstration of his high international prestige and rare wisdom and the strategic position of Juche Korea and are a great contribution to peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the region and the building of an independent, new world.
					
					 The letter expressed conviction that the building of a powerful socialist country would be victoriously accelerated in the DPRK and the cause of global independence would dynamically advance thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Sunday.
					 The letter said that in the world there are many leaders and stories about careers of great persons, but there has been no great revolutionary and peerlessly great man like the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who had enjoyed the absolute support and trust by the Korean people and the world people for his outstanding idea and leadership and noble virtues and decorated the 20th century with victory in the socialist cause, the cause of independence against imperialism, since he embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens.
					
					 It stressed that the exploits of Kim Il Sung, who provided the eternal treasure of the unshakable revolutionary tradition while overcoming all sorts of hardships in the 20-year-long anti-Japanese war, shouldering the destiny of the country and the nation, would shine long.
					
					 The letter noted that the great leader Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, identical to Kim Il Sung in the idea, leadership and virtue, had shown all kinds of paternal love for the Koreans in China, not forgetting them even a moment in the whole course of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The benevolent and warm compatriotic feelings of the great Generalissimos are given steady continuity thanks to the respected Supreme Leader Marshal Kim Jong Un, another illustrious brilliant commander and legendary great man, along with the might of Juche Korea growing stronger day by day, it said.
					
					 It pointed out that we will build up the General Association of Koreans in China into an unshakable overseas compatriots' organization absolutely supporting and following Kim Jong Un only, an organization strong in the Juche character and national identity, as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea who have steadfastly covered the road of patriotism, holding the great Generalissimos in high esteem.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They included Jin Yuhya, director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, and her party, Lorena Pena, chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation, and women delegations and delegates of different countries that came here to take part in meetings of the federation, and Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in the palace.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where the great leaders lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a bouquet at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from Jin Yuhya, director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, and her party on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Jin Yuhya conveyed the baskets to an official concerned Thursday.

articles.title: Organizing Committee of Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons Formed
articles.content:
Organizing Committee of Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons Formed
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The organizing committee of the International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Minsk of Belarus on April 11.
					 Elected as co-chairpersons of the committee at its inaugural ceremony were Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico, Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, Peter Woods, ambassador of Asia Pacific Region of the United Cities and Local Governments, Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and co-chairman of the Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, Fumihiro Himori, chairperson of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Anders Kristensen, 
					
					 chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, and Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People.
					
					 And announced was the communique of the organizing committee.
					
					 A letter to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Communique of Organizing Committee of Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons
articles.content:
Communique of Organizing Committee of Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The organizing committee of the International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu issued a communique on April 11. 
					 The communique said that the committee would further develop the festival into a grand international politico-cultural festival of the world's progressive peoples.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 For the immediate future, the Organizing Committee shall push ahead with the preparations to organize the 6th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu in Pyongyang and in the Mt. Paektu area in 2022, a year in which we mark the 110th birth anniversary of HE Kim Il Sung, the 80th birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il and the 10th anniversary of HE Kim Jong Un's assumption of the highest post of the Party and state of Korea.
					
					 The Organizing Committee shall widely organize and unfold the activities in support and defence of the Korean people in their struggle for just cause.
					
					 It shall condemn the most heinous sanctions and blockade schemes of the hostile forces against the DPRK, the bulwark and the banner of the anti-imperialist forces of independence, and champion Juche Korea. At the same time, it shall coordinate on a worldwide scale to widely organize the international solidarity movements in support of the Korean people in their struggle to frustrate moves of separatist forces at home and abroad and achieve the national reunification under the banner of national independence.
					
					 The Organizing Committee shall launch widespread campaigns to realize genuine international justice and build an independent world.
					
					 In joint efforts with different parties, organizations, international organizations across the world, and the world's progressive peoples aspiring to independence and justice, the Organizing Committee shall be in the vanguard of carrying on the struggle to denounce and reject the moves for aggression and war, and intervention in the domestic affairs of smaller countries perpetrated openly by the imperialist and dominationist forces under the pretext of "democracy" and "defending human rights", and to build an independent new world.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony Held for Forest Institute
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony Held for Forest Institute
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The Forest Institute is to be built in the DPRK.
					 A ground-breaking ceremony for its construction took place Thursday.
					
					 Present there were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Kyong Jun, minister of Land and Environment Protection, officials concerned, builders and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Vice-Premier Tong Jong Ho addressed the ceremony to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Joint Conference
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Joint Conference
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting for marking the 70th anniversary of the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea took place at the Central Youth Hall Thursday.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet and chairman of the State Planning Commission, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., Korean Social Democratic Party, Ri Son Gwon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK, Pak Myong Chol, director of the Secretariat and Presidium member of the C.C., Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, members of political parties and social organizations, members concerned of the North Headquarters for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the North Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the North Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, former unconverted long-term prisoners, working people in Pyongyang and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop made a report.
					
					 He said that the joint conference, held at the initiative and under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, was a historic national gathering for saving the destiny of the country and the nation through the great national unity under the banner of reunification and patriotism.
					
					 The President led a struggle to solve the nation's issue by the efforts of the Koreans themselves in line with the desire and wish of the entire Korean nation, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The cause of national reunification which the President pioneered and led to victory had been successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This cause, to which Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il put their lifetime devotion, has now greeted a new turning phase and is vigorously advancing under the outstanding guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for waging an unflinching struggle to bring earlier the final victory in building a powerful socialist country and the independent reunification of the country, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KFA Secretary Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
KFA Secretary Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Mana Sapmak, international organizational secretary of the Korean Friendship Association, on a visit to the DPRK to mark the Day of the Sun visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Wednesday.
					 Chief Pak Su Chol and members of the mission greeted and had a talk with the secretary.
					
					 At the talk, both sides informed each other of the activities of their organizations and discussed the matters for intensifying their solidarity activities.
					
					 Mana Sapmak expressed the will to conduct more dynamic solidarity activities for Korea's reunification, zealously hailing the fact that a turning phase for improved north-south relations has been opened thanks to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's firm will for reunification and his great magnanimity and noble compatriotism.

articles.title: Meetings of WIDF Open
articles.content:
Meetings of WIDF Open
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Secretariat of the Women's International Democratic Federation and a meeting of its Directive Committee were opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., Socialist Women's Union of Korea, its officials, women in Pyongyang, Lorena Pena, chairwoman of the Women's International Democratic Federation, and members of its leadership, women delegations and delegates from different countries, and members of foreign diplomatic and international missions here.
					
					 Choe Hwi made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said that the meetings of the WIDF in Pyongyang give courage to the women and other people of the DPRK striving to bring earlier the future of a powerful socialist country, expressing the belief that the meetings would mark a significant occasion in promoting the development of the WIDF and the world women's movement.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 Jang Chun Sil noted that the WIDF has grown into a powerful force in the struggle for realizing the genuine rights and social emancipation of women and international justice.
					
					 She affirmed that the SWUK would fulfill its international obligation and duty as a member of the Secretariat and Executive Committee of the WIDF. 
					
					 Chairwoman Lorena Pena said that the meetings in Pyongyang are a demonstration of firm solidarity with the Korean people including the women in their just cause.
					
					 The WIDF will hold aloft the banner of peace and independence against imperialism, take the lead in boosting friendship and solidarity among progressive women in the world and thus take the lead in the struggle for building a free and peaceful new world, she noted.

articles.title: 20th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
articles.content:
20th Kimilsungia Festival Closes
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The 20th Kimilsungia Festival closed on Thursday with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition. The festival was opened on April 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of the festival organizing committee, ministries, national institutions and armed forces organs, festival participants, members of the societies for supporting the dissemination of the immortal flowers, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 The festival diploma was awarded to a large number of units highly estimated at the festival and to the active participants including cultivators and lecturers and the participation certificate to individuals.
					
					 The diploma was also conferred on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and overseas compatriots, the Indonesian embassy and foreigners.

articles.title: 6th Sports Contest among Public Health Workers Opens
articles.content:
6th Sports Contest among Public Health Workers Opens
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The 6th sports contest among public health workers opened.
					 During the contest, competitions in basketball, volleyball, table tennis, tug of war and other events will be made at gymnasiums, stadiums and sports parks in Pyongyang and provinces.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Thursday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned and officials and players in the public health field and teachers and students of Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Jang Jun Sang made an opening speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there were a Taekwon-Do demonstration by officials of central level healthcare institutions and a men's volleyball match between players from Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University and the Korea General Red Cross Hospital.
					
					 The contest will last until May 1.

articles.title: Stamp Issued to Commemorate Kim Jong Un's Unofficial Visit to China
articles.content:
Stamp Issued to Commemorate Kim Jong Un's Unofficial Visit to China
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (one sheetlet) in commemoration of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's unofficial visit to China.
					 Seen in the stamp is a photo of Comrade Kim Jong Un having a significant meeting with Comrade Xi Jinping during his first visit to China against the flags of the DPRK and China for a background.
					
					 On its upper and lower parts are the letters reading "The commemoration of the respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un's unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China", "Historic event that promoted the DPRK-China friendship onto a new high level" and "March 25-28, Juche 107 (2018)".

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Anti-DPRK Remarks
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Hong Jun Phyo, representative of the "Liberal Korea Party", and other conservative riff-raffs of south Korea are describing the detente on the Korean peninsula as "result of sanctions and pressure", "camouflaged peace offensive" and "strategy for gaining time".
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary brands this as dirty invective of confrontational maniacs and mentally deranged persons, rejected by history and the mindset, after being marginalized by the trend of the times toward peace and reunification, to misrepresent the truth and tarnish the hard-won atmosphere for dialogue.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Their assertion that the present phase of situation is "result of sanctions and pressure" is shameless sophism that can be made by the group of traitors keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Their description about "camouflaged peace offensive" and "time-gaining strategy" is a traitorous one aimed to incite awareness of hostility toward the DPRK and check and quench the spirit for reunification through alliance with the north mounting among south Koreans.
					
					 No matter how mischievously a handful of fault-finders may try, no one will lend an ear to it nor can they check the trend of the times.
					
					 The conservative group should not run amuck, clearly understanding that all Koreans and the international community spit at their dirty demeanor.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails S. Korean Military's Provocative Act
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails S. Korean Military's Provocative Act
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military held a ceremony of founding the "war service command for mobilization of army" at the 3rd field army command on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the "Homeland Defence Reserve Forces" some days ago.
					 In this regard the south Korean military is trumpeting about "rendering the combat might of the reserve forces to the extremes", adding that "they would play a role for war victory".
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Thursday, branding this as a provocative act of going against the trend of the times, says that the untimely act of the south Korean military greatly disappointed Koreans wishing for peace and reunification.
					
					 The commentary continues:
					
					 Going against the desire and wish of the public at home and abroad to see the present situation on the Korean peninsula continue to bring about greater fruition, the south Korean military spurs the preparations for a war with the fellow countrymen in the north while watching for a chance for invading the north.
					
					 Through the establishment of the war service command, the south Korean military seeks a sinister intention to adjust the "Homeland Defence Reserve Forces" that was founded as civilian military organization in April 1968.
					
					 Such moves are aimed to keep the reserve forces, tantamount to standing army, under the control of the military and hurl them into the war of aggression against the north together with the south Korean army in the event of contingency. This is a shameless act of attacking with a dagger while making a smile on the face.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want dialogue and peace with the fellow countrymen, they should not remain an on-looker to such confrontational act of the south Korean war-like military forces.

articles.title: Publication Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Publication Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the National Theatre Thursday to mark the 30th publication anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Art of the Drama".
					 Present there were An Tong Chun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, and officials concerned, officials, creators, artistes, teachers, researchers and students in the fields of stage arts and art education and researchers, journalists and editors in the fields of social science and media.
					
					 Ri Ji Yong, chairman of the C.C., Theatrical Workers Union of Korea, made a report.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il systematically and regularly completed the idea and theory on the Juche-based dramatic art in the course of creating the five revolutionary dramas and established the creation system and method of "Mountain Shrine"-style drama and published the work "On the Art of the Drama" on April 20, Juche 77 (1988).
					
					 The publication of the work provided a powerful theoretical and practical weapon for making genuine drama truly serving the popular masses, and a sure guarantee for the Korean drama art to bring about efflorescence in its development, the reporter said.
					
					 He called for firmly defending and brilliantly carrying forward and developing Kim Jong Il's immortal leadership exploits and effecting fresh leap and innovations in the creation of dramas in the Mallima era.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held celebrations of the 106th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung at the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China on April 15.
					 Attending the celebrations were officials of the general association, including Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo, and delegates of its regional associations and branches, members of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China and the Association of Young Korean Nationals in China, Korean residents in Jilin City, officials of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, DPRK citizens working in three northeastern provinces of China, the vice-director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Jilin Province People's Government, the chief secretary of the Jilin City People's Government, the head and the party secretary of the Yuwen Middle School and other Chinese personages.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets at the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Yuwen Middle School and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A meeting of the general association for celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung took place.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo made a report there.
					
					 He recalled that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung liberated the country and built it into an invincible power dignified with independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people are now fully demonstrating the dignity and mettle of Kim Il Sung's nation as they have Marshal Kim Jong Un as their Supreme Leader, the reporter called for upholding the guidance of the respected Marshal with a single mind of loyalty and filial devotion,.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 After the meeting the participants went round the venues of Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition and photo and book exhibition and enjoyed an art performance given by Korean artistes in China and DPRK citizens working in three northeastern provinces of China at the Songhuajiang Grand Theatre.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Yanbian, Liaoning and Zhongnan regional associations under the general association organized such celebration events as meeting of adopting letter to Kim Jong Un, floral basket-laying ceremony, photo and book exhibition and film show from April 8 to 14.

articles.title: Decide convocar el 3o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Decide convocar el 3o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea decidio convocar el dia 20 el 3o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC para discutir y determinar los problemas politicos de nueva etapa conforme a la demanda de la importante epoca historica de desarrollo de la revolucion.
					Quedo publicada el dia 18 la resolucion correspondiente del BP del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Groups Leave
Pyongyang, April 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates of Juche idea study groups left here for home on Thursday. 
					 They were delegations of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, and a Bulgarian delegate for the study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Departing earlier was a delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion de partido ruso y personalidad italiana
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion de partido ruso y personalidad italiana
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio este jueves por separado con la delegacion del Comite del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa en la Ciudad de Moscu, encabezada por su primer secretario Valery Rashukin, y el presidente del Grupo de Inversion General de Italia, Giancarlo Elia Valori, que le realizaron las visitas de cortesia.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, ofrecio hoy una recepcion en su sede diplomatica.
					Fueron invitados Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Ryu Myong Son, subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el vicecanciller Ho Yong Bok, Kim Ik Song, titular de la Direccion General del Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ocasion.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por el 70o aniversario de conferencia conjunta de abril
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por el 70o aniversario de conferencia conjunta de abril
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 70o aniversario de la Conferencia Conjunta de Abril de los Representantes de los Partidos Politicos y las Organizaciones Sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Ro Tu Chol, vicepremier y presidente del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Ri Son Gwon, presidente del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Pak Myong Chol, secretario general y miembro de la presidencia del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, los miembros de los partidos politicos y entidades sociales, los relacionados del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, los trabajadores capitalinos y los coreanos residentes en ultramar.
					
					El informe del acto estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop.
					
					El apunto que la Conferencia Conjunta de Abril de los Representantes de los Partidos Politicos y las Organizaciones Sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea, propuesta y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, fue una historica reunion nacional para salvar el destino del pais y la nacion al lograr la gran unidad nacional bajo la bandera de reunificacion y patriotismo.
					
					Se refirio a que el Presidente hizo resolver con la fuerza propia de la nacion el problema nacional de acuerdo con la voluntad y el anhelo de todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					La causa de reunificacion de la patria, iniciada y guiada a la victoria por el Presidente, continuo y se desarrollo con exito gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, agrego.
					
					El informador senalo que la causa de reunificacion de la patria, en que estan registrados los esfuerzos de toda la vida del Presidente y el Dirigente, acoge nueva coyuntura de viraje y avanza con dinamismo bajo la sabia direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Exhorto a luchar con mas energia por adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de potencia socialista y la reunificacion independiente de la patria, uniendose firmemente en torno al Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Se abren las reuniones del Secretariado y del Comite Ejecutivo de la FDIM
articles.content:
Se abren las reuniones del Secretariado y del Comite Ejecutivo de la FDIM
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la ceremonia de inauguracion de las reuniones del Secretariado y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Federacion Democratica Internacional de Mujeres (FDIM). 
					Asistieron a la ocasion el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Hwi, la presidenta Jang Chun Sil y otras funcionarias del Comite Central de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea, las trabajadoras de la capital asi como Lorena Pena, presidenta de la FDIM, las integrantes de la Direccion de la FDIM, las delegaciones femeninas y las delegadas provenientes de varios paises y los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en Corea. 
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso de felicitacion, Choe Hwi dijo que la apertura de las reuniones de la FDIM en Pyongyang estimula mucho al pueblo y mujeres de Corea que libran una campana dinamica para adelantar el futuro de la potencia socialista. 
					
					Y manifesto la esperanza de que esas reuniones seran una oportunidad significativa para fomentar el desarrollo de la FDIM y el movimiento femenino mundial. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo discursos. 
					
					Jang Chun Sil menciono que la FDIM se ha fortalecido como una fuerza poderosa en la lucha por lograr los verdaderos derechos y emancipacion social de las mujeres y la justicia internacional. 
					
					Afirmo que la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea cumplira con su deber internacional como miembro del Secretariado y del Comite Ejecutivo de la FDIM. 
					
					Lorena Pena destaco que la apertura de las presentes reuniones en Pyongyang testimonia la firme solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo y mujeres de Corea. 
					
					Ella subrayo que la FDIM fortalecera la amistad y solidaridad entre las mujeres progresistas del mundo enarbolando la bandera de paz y independencia antiimperialista y avanzara fuertemente en el frente de la lucha por construir el nuevo mundo libre y pacifico.
					
					Por otra parte, el mimo dia, el Comite Central de la Socialista de Mujeres de Corea ofrecio en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang un banquete para los participantes.

articles.title: Clausurado XX Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Clausurado XX Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 19 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el XX Festival de Kimilsungias, iniciado el dia 12 en ocasion del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar este jueves en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Pak Kwang Ho, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios del comite organizativo del festival, los ministerios, los organos centrales y las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, los participantes en el festival, los miembros de la sociedad de apoyo a la divulgacion de flores inmortales, la delegacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, los coreanos en el extranjero y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Fue otorgado el diploma del festival a muchas unidades que obtuvieron excelente evaluacion, los cultivadores ejemplares, las conferenciantes, otros participantes ejemplares e individuales.
					
					Tambien, lo recibieron la Asociacion General de los Coreanos Residentes en Japon, otros coreanos en ultramar, la embajada indonesica en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
